name: Rush Back To Gravity
description:
Take control of a broken ship that you only make it turn forward, it turns by it's own.

Avoid the asteroids, or destroy them, find power-ups and reach the International Space Station to reapir your ship.

DISCLAIMER: All assets, graphics and sounds are made by me, except music and fonts.
Music belongs to Square Enix and Platinum Games, from the title NieR: Automata. https://www.niergame.com/
Fonts belong to Jason Kottke: http://www.kottke.org/plus/type/silkscreen/index.html
